w:r.w:t: with CS & PTS pg. number; use
asehi bhikkhusatehi. Tena kho pana samayena r
davaragato nisinno hoti. Atha kho r
to nisinno hoti. Atha kho r
”ti. “Na kho me, bhante, garu, yatthassa Bhagav
kareyya; evameva kho me, bhante, Makkhali
kareyya; evameva kho me, bhante, Pa
nu kho, bho aggivessana, evameva di
tthi paro lokoti iti ce ma
pucchasi, atthi paro lokoti iti ce me assa, atthi paro lokoti iti te na
no, no notipi me no. Natthi paro loko …pe… atthi ca
natthi ca paro loko …pe… nevatthi na natthi paro loko …pe… atthi satt
pucchasi, neva hoti na na hoti
ti iti ce me assa, neva hoti na na hoti
tipi me no, notipi me no, no notipi me no’ti.
ja, idha te assa puriso d
ho, abhirato paviveke’ti. Api nu tva
si-- ‘Etu me, bho, so puriso, punadeva hotu d
ja, idha te assa puriso kassako gahapatiko karak
ho, abhirato paviveke”ti. Api nu tva
si-- ‘Etu me, bho, so puriso, punadeva hotu kassako gahapatiko karak
jayo bhavissati, iti imassa jayo bhavissati, imassa par
tena So yena yeneva pakkamati, sam
tena. So yena yeneva pakkamati, sam
ya kammante payojeyya. Tassa te kammant
re baddho assa. So aparena samayena tamh
re santike ca. Idampi kho, mah
yupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udap
yupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udap
hito passeyya sippisambukampi sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi carantampi ti
